channel.title: CVE Feed for CryoutCreations -- Anima
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CryoutCreations -- Anima

item.title: CVE-2024-37248|2024-06-27T13:49:56.317Z -- cryoutcreations -- anima
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CryoutCreations Anima allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Anima: from n/a through 1.4.1.
